text: Myke Bouard Ramos (born 30 October 1992) is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a forward for MTK Budapest FC. ==Senior career== Starting in local club Paraná Clube, he then moved to Hungary to play for Salgótarjáni BTC where he achieved a twelve goals in thirteen competitive games for the aforementioned outfit. The following season he signed for Varda SE.
